data.message: Hi  Facebook I can't do any of this as none of my messages will load, I've tried clearing my cache, I've tried force stop, I've tried uninstalling and they couldn't get it working! I've reported the problem 3 times to you. This morning when I click on an active person it says. Sorry there is a problem. Please try again. I've tried to pm you, but doesn't look like it's gone through. Can I please have some help

replies.message: Thanks for reporting this to us, Shehzad! Due to the volume of reports we receive, it may take us a bit to review it. We appreciate your patience. -Stephanie
